wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Ronald (born 19 July 1971 in Glasgow) is a Scottish former football player.
He was the manager of East Superleague club, Bo'ness United from June 2011 until September 2012. On 11 May 2013, Ronald joined Kirkintilloch Rob Roy as assistant manager to Stewart Maxwell.
